mapper.select: select no, title, memberId, regDate, hit from runningboard order by no desc
select no, title, content, memberId, regDate, hit from runningboard where no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into runningboard(no, title, content, memberId) values (#{no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{memberId})
mapper.update: update runningboard set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, memberId=#{memberId} where no=#{no}
